title: 501 - Meeting America’s Public Health Challenge: Recommendations for Building a National Public Health System
itunes:title: 501 - Meeting America’s Public Health Challenge: Recommendations for Building a National Public Health System
description: The public health system has been fragmented and haphazard for years, and COVID-19 showed just how consequential a weak system can be. Former FDA Commissioner Peggy Hamburg talks with Stephanie Desmon about a Commonwealth Fund report that looks at how to build a national public health system that addresses ongoing and future health crises, advances equity, and earns trust. Learn more here.
